nodes.bodyText: This building was turned into a crafter. Yet no methods where overriden. Sooo is this a default crafter? I think you would like ant to limit the recipes would you not?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -33,7 +34,7 @@
 /**
  * The enchanter building.
  */
-public class BuildingEnchanter extends AbstractBuildingWorker
+public class BuildingEnchanter extends AbstractBuildingCrafter

nodes.bodyText: @OrionDevelopment afaik that is all data driven now. @Mekle001 this should be fine as is, right?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -33,7 +34,7 @@
 /**
  * The enchanter building.
  */

+public class BuildingEnchanter extends AbstractBuildingCrafter
